pages.text: A rare but delicious bluish mushroom, that shimmers and lights up its surrounding.$(br2)Adult mushrooms can spread spores that have a positive effect on night vision.
This mushroom has a dark blue color with yellow glimmering dots.
When fully grown, the cap contains a small amount of Glowstone that can be harvested.

pages.title: Night Vision
pages.text: The special spores of the Glowshroom allow you to make potions and tipped arrows of night vision from them.
